document.full_text: leaders from five of the world's top emerging economies will discuss a coordinated stance on economic issues such as commodity price fluctuations, but the yuan's exchange rate is off the agenda, a senior chinese diplomat said on saturday.
document.title: "brics" to talk economic coordination, not yuan: china
lines_and_colors: leaders from five of the world's top emerging economies will discuss a coordinated stance on economic issues such as commodity price fluctuations, but the yuan's exchange rate is off the agenda, a senior chinese diplomat said on saturday.
